DOC.detailed_description: An observational registry diagnosis management stable angina India Purpose To describe clinical profile current status diagnosis management stable angina India non-interventional consulting physician ( CP ) large multicenter observational registry . Design A prospective , multi-center , observational registry . Subject Population Adult , male female subject symptomatic stable angina visit non-interventional consulting physician treatment meet study inclusion/exclusion criterion . Enrollment : The study expect enroll 1000 1500 subject 150 - 250 non-interventional consulting physician . The enrollment period around 4 month . Inclusion criterion Subject must meet follow criterion eligible inclusion trial : 1 . Subject provisionally diagnose stable angina CP ( consult physician ) current visit within 3 month precede current visit 2 . Subject agree sign data release form Exclusion criterion Subjects exclude trial follow criterion meet : 1 . Subject history Acute Coronary Syndrome 2 . Subject history prior revascularization 3 . Subject history previous MI 4 . Subject new onset angina symptom less one month Objectives : 1 . Describe demographic medical profile subject diagnose stable angina non-interventional consulting physician India 2 . Describe diagnostic pathway prescribe non-interventional consulting physician adopt stable angina subject India 3 . Describe management stable angina non-interventional consulting physician undertaken subject India
